normal.queries: [{"value":"select  group_name as creatordeptname from oa_employee_h where code=#[map-payload:ApplierHrId] and (status=0 or status=1)"},{"value":"select oid as applicantid,code as applicantcode,name as applicantname, deptid as applicantdeptname,position_descr,adaccount,CC_Name_Approve as CostCenterName,CC_Code_Approve as CostCenterCode from oa_employee_h where code=#[map-payload:ApplierHrId] and (status=0 or status=1)"},{"value":"select oid as currency from dict_currency where code=#[map-payload:Currency] and (status=0 or status=1)"},{"value":" select oid as creator, code as creatorcode from sys_operator where code=#[map-payload:ApplierHrId] and (status=0 or status=1)"}]

exception.text: 把异常信息替换换行符_ERP_TO_BPM_PO
exception.description: 把异常信息替换换行符
exception.scriptContent:
String exceptionContent = message.getPayload();String exception = exceptionContent.replace("\n", "
");message.setPayload(exception);return message;
